omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
select  
		distinct
			op.NHSNumber,
			op.SUSgeneratedspellID,

			coalesce(op.AppointmentDate, op.CDSActivityDate) as VisitStartDate,  -- visit_start_date
			coalesce(op.AppointmentTime, '000000') as VisitStartTime,  -- visit_start_time
			coalesce(op.AppointmentDate, op.CDSActivityDate) as VisitEndDate,
			null as VisitEndTime
	from omop_staging.sus_OP op
	where op.UpdateType = 9   -- New/Modification     (1 = Delete)
		and op.NHSNumber is not null
		and AttendedorDidNotAttend in ('5','6')
	order by
		op.NHSNumber,
		op.SUSgeneratedspellID,
		op.AppointmentDate,
		op.AppointmentTime,
		op.CDSActivityDate

omopColumns.name: HospitalProviderSpellNumber

dataSource.name: SUSgeneratedspellID
dataSource.description: System generated value spell id, this id is consistent across all records belonging to the same spell.

		op.AppointmentTime,
		op.CDSActivityDate

omopColumns.name: visit_detail_start_datetime
omopColumns.operation_description: Combines a date with a time of day.

dataSource.name: VisitStartDate
dataSource.description: Start date of the episode, if exists, else the start date of the spell.

dataSource.name: VisitStartTime
dataSource.description: Start time of the episode, if exists, else midnight.

omopColumns.query:
select  
		distinct
			op.NHSNumber,
			op.SUSgeneratedspellID,

			coalesce(op.AppointmentDate, op.CDSActivityDate) as VisitStartDate,  -- visit_start_date
			coalesce(op.AppointmentTime, '000000') as VisitStartTime,  -- visit_start_time
			coalesce(op.AppointmentDate, op.CDSActivityDate) as VisitEndDate,
			null as VisitEndTime
	from omop_staging.sus_OP op
	where op.UpdateType = 9   -- New/Modification     (1 = Delete)
		and op.NHSNumber is not null
		and AttendedorDidNotAttend in ('5','6')
	order by
		op.NHSNumber,
		op.SUSgeneratedspellID,
		op.AppointmentDate,
		op.AppointmentTime,
		op.CDSActivityDate

omopColumns.name: visit_detail_type_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `32818`. `EHR administration record`
